Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/21st
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Cermak, Marshall, Ogden and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Kedzie/21st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How  will this affect my trip?

 

#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Cermak, Marshall, Ogden, Kedzie and over regular route, due to street blockage near Kedzie/21st.

Allow extra travel time.
